column4: hi, is there anyway someone can create interference on wifi bands? 2.4 GHZ
some wireless telephones, and some ham equiptment
i have replace an old router 2.4GHZ with a new dualband one.. when it was 2.4 same problems arose... when i use 5GHZ no slow network.. even if 5GHZ signals suck alot..
thats why i say someone might be messing w/my wifi 2.4GHZ connection and would like to know how can one do it.. i have googled and googled with not much luck
